description: Submission of details pursuant to condition 42 (Air Permeability Testing Blocks A2 and A3 only) of planning permission 2019/2514 dated 09/12/2020
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Condition 42 of 2019/2514 states:&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Air Permeability Testing Prior to final occupation of the occupation of the development, certification confirming that the development has achieved an FEE of 32.34 kWh/m2/ yr and an average Air Permeability of 4 m3/h/m2 at 50Pa shall be submitted to, and approved in writing, by, the Local Planning Authority. The development shall be carried out in full accordance with the approved details and maintained as such thereafter.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: In the interest of addressing climate change and to protect local air quality and contribute towards the maintenance or to prevent further exceedances of National Air Quality Objectives.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Assessment</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The submitted details have been reviewed by the Sustainability Officer in the CUDS team who have commented that the details submitted are acceptable (referenced below) in terms of a partial discharge in relation to Blocks A2 and A3.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The submitted details satisfy the requirements of condition 42 of 2019/2514. The development shall thereafter be implemented and maintained in complete accordance with the approved details. The informational requirements of this condition require further details (certificates) to be assessed in full.&nbsp; The approved details in relation to this condition are considered to be.&nbsp;</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-inline-start:48px;"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;" aria-level="1"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Cover Letter by Rolfe Judd Planning, submitted to the planning portal on 05/08/24.&nbsp;</span></p></li><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;"
